name: Death Zone (Thomas Sauerzapf, chiara.marker, MowDow, Huntererererer, Benni SC, Sarah Wegmann)
name_original: Death Zone (Thomas Sauerzapf, chiara.marker, MowDow, Huntererererer, Benni SC, Sarah Wegmann)
description:
All of us have to make decisions. 

Even a common day is determined by countless decisions. We might feel like we´re only affected by our own decisions. The truth is: We are not! Decisions of other people affect us, even if we don´t recognise them. But imagine you´re making an decision which affects another person. This person reacts to it with another decision. And it goes on and on. 

What do you think could happen? Well, we´ll never know. 

To put this thought into an evidence, we present you: Death Zone! 

Slip into the role of two characters who might be as different as a lake and a desert. The life in a post-apocalyptic world can force you to make hard decisions day by day. Before you even notice you might have affected another person´s life. Not to mention that you could easily become your own doom! 

We don´t want you to experience a year, a month or a week! We want you to experience a single day in Death Zone. Will you keep the balance and prevent both protagonists from suffering a dreadful fate?

This game was created within the Global Game Jam 2022. But it received some bug fixes since then.
